name: Whitefrog Design
tagline: Redlands Branding, Design, and Marketing Firm
description:
Whitefrog is a branding, design and marketing firm that creates powerful experiences for its clients. Whitefrog works with its clients to define their value, visually communicate, and promote and prosper their brands.
Whitefrog's team of in-house and freelance designers works together to give our clients' brands the best possible presence. One size never fits all, so we take the time to create an experience that is customized to meet the goals and budgets of our clients.
